Package library.exceptions

  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    AlreadyInitialized
    Exception to manage the attempt to initialize a connection that has already been initialized
    DoubleMarkerException
    Exception to manage the reception of a double identical marker which should not happen and clearly indicates problems
    NotInitialized
    Exception to manage the attempt to utilize a connection that has not been initialized
    OperationForbidden
    Exception to manage the execution of an operation that is not allowed.
    RemoteNodeAlreadyPresent
    Exception to manage the attempt to connect to a node that is already connected
    RemoteNodeNotFound
    Exception to manage the attempt to connect to a node that cannot be found
    RestoreAlreadyInProgress
    Exception that it's raised when an attempt to restore two different snapshots occurs
    RestoreException
    Exception to manage the attempt to initialize a connection that has already been initialized
    RestoreInProgress
    Exception to manage the attempt to initialize a connection that has already been initialized
    RestoreNotPossible
    Exception that it's raised when an attempt to restore two different snapshots occurs
    SnapshotInterruptException
    Exception to manage the case of network broken or node crash during a Snapshot, which violates assumptions
    StateUpdateException
    Exception to manage issues in updating the state
    UnexpectedMarkerReceived
    Exception to manage the reception of a marker from a node that is not connected to the host
